body:
Hi,

Please use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask this kind of questions.
In particular this as already been answered [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/tensor-grad-none-for-tensors-on-gpu/24838) in the forum: when you cann `.cuda()`, you get a new tensor that is not a leaf tensor and thus it's `.grad` field will not be populated.
